fly.name: Fly
fly.description: Can pass through obstacles, including other characters, but must finish movement on an unobstructed tile.

stormlight.name: Stormlight
stormlight.description: Used to fuel the special abilities of Knights Radiant.

finishing.name: Finishing
finishing.description: The character cannot take any further actions this turn after using this ability.

livingShardplate.name: Living Shardplate
livingShardplate.description: Your armor is increased to 3, unless it is already higher

silenced.name: Silenced
silenced.description: You cannot use any special abilities.

pancakes.name: Pancakes
pancakes.description: Can be consumed by Lift to produce Lifelight

lifelight.name: Lifelight
lifelight.description: Used to fuel Lift's special abilities.

metal.name: Metal
metal.description: Used to fuel the special abilities of Allomancers.
